assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

group.label: Research involving human participants and/or animals
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This article does not contain any studies with human participants or animals performed by any of the authors.Data included here refer to identified human subpopulations in which all individual human subjects were anonymized at the initial registration phase. Brazilian legislation (Resolução CNS 466/2012) does not require IRB approval for data obtained from public databases, as is the case for CENISO.
